name: Kiub
description:
People of Kiub have been turned into board game pieces! Now they have to reach The Great Vortex Portal to restore their true form. With great skills and special dices, everyone is on their own and must finish before their rival while they hop around mysterious floating islands.

  • Fast-Paced Turn-Based Strategy!: Play against a friend in a fierce and quick match!
  • Unique Characters with Amazing Skills!: Try different strategies and use skills with different dices!
  • Beautiful and Exciting Worlds!: Explore the boards and reach high score throwing your dice around the world!

    • Kiub is a board game with familiar elements of classic RPGs. With many characters to discover, you can customize each and every one of them by choosing their unique skills and dices. Play against a friend and unleash every superpower and dices to unlock the way through different worlds waiting to be explored.
